Author: Regnar#6164
Content:
Hey traders, what are your favorite trading indicators for TA? I'm messing around with some python and using a years worth of BTC price data to build a dataframe.
I already have the following for the past year. Just wondering what others are cool to have and that traders like to use.
```python
'close',  'high',  'low',  'market_cap',  'open',  'time_close',  'time_open',  'volume',  'fiveSMA', 'twentySMA', 'fiftySMA', 'onehundredSMA', 'twohundredSMA', 'stdDev', 'bollinger_high', 'bollinger_low', 'twenty_below_fifty',  'price_below_twohundred'```

Author: Regnar#6164
Content: the SMAs are in days, stdDev is rolling 20 day, bollinger bands are two standard deviations from 20 SMA (?), and `True` and `False` for if 20 SMA is below 50 SMA, as well as if the price is below the 200 SMA

Content: Not trading make u lose so many opportunities

Author: Markus#5464
Content: just imagine if u had 1-3 btc and bought kmd on daily basis everytime u have a red candle (not for all ur btc ofc) u keep repeating this step over and over which means u have a significantly lower average price then if u bought at lets say 30k sats, u do sell a small portion that will grant u profit whenever there is a green day for kmd.

Author: Markus#5464
Content: this means u will keep getting more btc to buy even more kmd the lower price go

Author: Markus#5464
Content: u will find some buys to never get sold tho for quite sometime but thats fine cause ur average is getting lower and lower
